tool_description: Analyzes chemical and physical properties of liquid or solid propellants including density, specific impulse, combustion temperature, and compatibility characteristics.

propellant_type.description: Type of propellant: liquid_bipropellant, liquid_monopropellant, solid_composite, hybrid

fuel_name.description: Chemical name or identifier of the fuel component

oxidizer_name.description: Chemical name or identifier of the oxidizer component

mixture_ratio.description: Oxidizer to fuel mass ratio (0.1 to 20.0)

chamber_pressure.description: Combustion chamber pressure in bar (1.0 to 300.0)

error_messages: Invalid propellant type: Must be one of [liquid_bipropellant, liquid_monopropellant, solid_composite, hybrid]
Incompatible propellant combination: The specified fuel and oxidizer combination is not chemically compatible
Mixture ratio out of range: Value must be between 0.1 and 20.0
Chamber pressure out of range: Value must be between 1.0 and 300.0 bar
Missing oxidizer: Bipropellant systems require both fuel_name and oxidizer_name
usage: Specify propellant_type, fuel_name, and chamber_pressure. For bipropellant systems, also provide oxidizer_name and optionally mixture_ratio. The tool calculates key propellant properties for engine design.

molecular_weight.description: Average molecular weight of combustion products in g/mol
